body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

@adamjstewart  @skosukhin

`spack install python`

either returns a hanging:
```
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.828857] '/usr/bin/patch' '-N' '-p' '1' '-i' '/projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/tkinter-3.8.patch' '-d' '.'
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.839199] Applied patch /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/python/tkinter-3.8.patch
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.840206] FILTER FILE: Makefile.pre.in [replacing "^(.*)setup\.py(.*)((build)|(install))(.*)$"]
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.845028] Ran patch() for python
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.845169] python: Building python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu [AutotoolsPackage]
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.860066] python: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> [2021-11-17-19:53:56.870420] python: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> [2021-11-17-19:55:13.563657] python: Executing phase: 'build'
==> [2021-11-17-19:57:34.024648] python: Executing phase: 'install'
``` 
which doesn't complete or a seemingly never-ending:
```
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.095098] Installing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu in progress by another process
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.095159] Requeueing a build task for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with status 'installing'
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.095227] Processing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu: task=priority=0, status=dequeued, start=1637203195.6624238, #dependencies=13
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.100106] Acquiring a write lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 1e-09
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.100193] Failed to acquire a write lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a write lock.
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:40.100233] Acquiring a read lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 3
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.106581] Failed to acquire a read lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a read lock.
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.106832] Installing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu in progress by another process
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.106980] Requeueing a build task for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with status 'installing'
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.107043] Processing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu: task=priority=0, status=dequeued, start=1637203195.6624238, #dependencies=13
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.112589] Acquiring a write lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 1e-09
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.112672] Failed to acquire a write lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a write lock.
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:43.112713] Acquiring a read lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 3
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.119083] Failed to acquire a read lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a read lock.
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.119182] Installing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu in progress by another process
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.119228] Requeueing a build task for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with status 'installing'
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.119290] Processing python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu: task=priority=0, status=dequeued, start=1637203195.6624238, #dependencies=13
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.122195] Acquiring a write lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 1e-09
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.122273] Failed to acquire a write lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a write lock.
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:46.122312] Acquiring a read lock on python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu with timeout 3
==> [2021-11-17-19:44:49.128674] Failed to acquire a read lock for python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu due to LockTimeoutError: Timed out waiting for a read lock.
```


Looking at `/tmp/pakuber/spack-stage/spack-stage-python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/spack-build-04-install-out.txt`
```
PYTHONPATH=/projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/lib/python3.8  LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/tmp/pakuber/spack-stage/spack-stage-python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/spack-src/spack-build \
    ./python -E -Wi /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/lib/python3.8/compileall.py \
    -j0 -d /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/lib/python3.8 -f \
    -x 'bad_coding|badsyntax|site-packages|lib2to3/tests/data' \
    /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/lib/python3.8
Listing '/projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/python-3.8.12-lsammmx5vxnha2z74wsvt6u77icuy6qu/lib/python3.8'...
Traceback (most recent call last):
```
but it is hanging before the traceback prints.

Just to summarize, when it acquires a lock, it makes it to the 'installing' step before throwing an exception that results in a hang.


### Information on your system

`spack debug report`:
```
* **Spack:** 0.17.0
* **Python:** 3.7.10
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

A detail about this system that may be relevant is that it has 576 cores and is running RHEL7.

```
Architecture:          x86_64
CPU op-mode(s):        32-bit, 64-bit
Byte Order:            Little Endian
CPU(s):                576
On-line CPU(s) list:   0-575
Thread(s) per core:    2
Core(s) per socket:    24
Socket(s):             12
NUMA node(s):          12
Vendor ID:             GenuineIntel
CPU family:            6
Model:                 85
Model name:            Intel(R) Xeon(R) Platinum 8160 CPU @ 2.10GHz
Stepping:              4
```


### Additional information

ACLOCAL_PATH=/projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-skylake_avx512/gcc-9.2.0/pkgconf-1.8.0-dl6yoge2bc5pj53lftzqi5nztbcku7tl/share/aclocal; export ACLOCAL_PATH
function _spack_shell_wrapper() {  for var in LD_LIBRARY_PATH DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH DYLD_FALLBACK_LIBRARY_PATH;
 do
 eval "if [ -n \"\${${var}-}\" ]; then export SPACK_$var=\${${var}}; fi";
 done;
 if [ -n "${ZSH_VERSION:-}" ]; then
 emulate -L sh;
 fi;
 _sp_flags="";
 while [ ! -z ${1+x} ] && [ "${1#-}" != "${1}" ]; do
 _sp_flags="$_sp_flags $1";
 shift;
 done;
 if [ -n "$_sp_flags" ] && [ "${_sp_flags#*h}" != "${_sp_flags}" ] || [ "${_sp_flags#*V}" != "${_sp_flags}" ]; then
 command spack $_sp_flags "$@";
 return;
 fi;
 _sp_subcommand="";
 if [ ! -z ${1+x} ]; then
 _sp_subcommand="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 case $_sp_subcommand in 
 "cd")
 _sp_arg="";
 if [ -n "$1" ]; then
 _sp_arg="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 if [ "$_sp_arg" = "-h" ] || [ "$_sp_arg" = "--help" ]; then
 command spack cd -h;
 else
 LOC="$(spack location $_sp_arg "$@")";
 if [ -d "$LOC" ]; then
 cd "$LOC";
 else
 return 1;
 fi;
 fi;
 return
 ;;
 "env")
 _sp_arg="";
 if [ -n "$1" ]; then
 _sp_arg="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 if [ "$_sp_arg" = "-h" ] || [ "$_sp_arg" = "--help" ]; then
 command spack env -h;
 else
 case $_sp_arg in 
 activate)
 _a=" $@";
 if [ -z ${1+x} ] || [ "${_a#* --sh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --csh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* -h}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --help}" != "$_a" ]; then
 command spack env activate "$@";
 else
 stdout="$(command spack $_sp_flags env activate --sh "$@")" || return;
 eval "$stdout";
 fi
 ;;
 deactivate)
 _a=" $@";
 if [ "${_a#* --sh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --csh}" != "$_a" ]; then
 command spack env deactivate "$@";
 else
 if [ -n "$*" ]; then
 command spack env deactivate -h;
 else
 stdout="$(command spack $_sp_flags env deactivate --sh)" || return;
 eval "$stdout";
 fi;
 fi
 ;;
 *)
 command spack env $_sp_arg "$@"
 ;;
 esac;
 fi;
 return
 ;;
 "load" | "unload")
 _a=" $@";
 if [ "${_a#* --sh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --csh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* -h}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --list}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --help}" != "$_a" ]; then
 command spack $_sp_flags $_sp_subcommand "$@";
 else
 stdout="$(command spack $_sp_flags $_sp_subcommand --sh "$@")" || return;
 eval "$stdout";
 fi
 ;;
 *)
 command spack $_sp_flags $_sp_subcommand "$@"
 ;;
 esac
}; export -f _spack_shell_wrapper
function module() {  eval `/usr/bin/modulecmd bash $*`
}; export -f module
function spack() {  : this is a shell function from: /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/share/spack/setup-env.sh;
 : the real spack script is here: /projects/gmls_xyce/spack_2021-11-17/bin/spack;
 _spack_shell_wrapper "$@";
 return $?
}; export -f spack
